summary: An Ordinance relating to and providing for the making and repayment of a temporary loan of Eighteen Thousand Dollars ($18,000.00) from the General Fund of the City of Seattle to Local Improvement District No. 3238 for the purpose of paying the cost and expense of the improvement of Forty-second Avenue Southwest, et al, by grading, as provided in Ordinance No. 40092 of said city.
